name: Babai
wishText: I hope you have an amazing day filled with love and happiness. You deserve the best;)
textInChatBox: On this special day, I want thank you for being an amazing dad
text2: I am so grateful for all the love and support you give me
text3: You have always been my cheerleader, my biggest fan, and my best friend
outroText: Continue to have a great day filled with laughter and eat lots of cake
